summary: Replaces Frost with a Shadowfax texture- the noble, white mare of Gandalf and the lord of all horses.
descriptionHtml:
[color=blue][size=18][b]Shadowfax horse texture![/b][/size][/color]

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
This is my humble attempt at adding Shadowfax to Skyrim, bringing two of my favorite fantasy worlds together.  Shadowfax is a noble white horse, ridden by Gandalf the wizard.  This replaces the texture of Frost (but maintaining its other properties) from a quest in Riften, as well as the Palomino horse from Solitude.

[b]INSTRUCTIONS[/b]
Simply copy and past the textures folder into the Data folder of
your Skyrim install directory. Usually: C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim
To uninstall, simply delete the horse02.dds and horsemanetail02.dds files contained in the directories.

[b]DISCLAIMERS/NOTES[/b]
Damnit, Jim, I\'m a doctor, not an artist!
This is my absolute first mod to any game! Being such, I welcome any feedback, and this is an ongoing project that I hope to improve.  I still don\'t fully understand how to fix the normal map, so that is probably my first goal (it is too shiny in my opinion).
Use this at your own (although minimal) risk!

[b][size=12]Enjoy! And please give feedback![/size][/b]
author: BurnInHeaven aka Mister Fahrenheit
